00658F6B.VoiceDir5.EECAE: Informative, with a bit of hopeful anticipation

2B50A2C0.Line7.EECAE: This guy was a real butcher, and he eventually passed his skill with a blade along with the cleaver itself to his daughter, Khaliun.

5D73363A.Line1.EECAE: In fact, I do. There's another artifact I've heard of, but haven't yet had the chance to pursue -  the cleaver of an Overseer.

667115E9.VoiceDir3.EECAE: Slightly gleeful, while foreboding. Telling the player a tale

915C293E.Line5.EECAE: The vault was long since raided and the mages driven out, but I've hope it's still buried in one of the chests therein.

9A5A08ED.VoiceDir7.EECAE: In awe; telling a story of someone he finds interesting

CC7C9C67.VoiceDir1.EECAE: As if sharing a secret; slightly gleeful/hopefuly

F767AFBC.Line3.EECAE: Following Khaliun's death and suspecting a darkness in the cleaver, the mages managed to get ahold of it and lock it away in the Whispering Vault.
